definition: to govern/to have complete control over/to be in command of
to govern/to control/having jurisdiction over/linchpin of a wheel (archaic)/noise of a barrow

sentences.english: What governs and controls the human verbal communication is relevance.
sentences.chinese: 制約和統轄人們交際行爲的是關聯。

sentences.english: Tigers Eye or Rutilated Quartz holds the vibration of Non-Conditional Governance in the Language of Light.
sentences.chinese: 虎眼石或發晶持有光之語中無條件統轄的振動。

sentences.english: Humanity also lost their spiritual leadership and governance as a result.
sentences.chinese: 人類因而也喪失了他們靈性的領導層和統轄。
